FuncDef: The display ospf request-queue command displays the OSPF request list.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an OSPF process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the neighbor router ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: The Router's Neighbor is Router ID 4.4.4.4         Address 10.1.4.2
Type       LinkState ID      AdvRouter         Sequence   Age
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the OSPF request list, run the display ospf request-queue command. The command output can help you troubleshoot OSPF faults.
